title: Probably Cancelled | The Decline of the Left w/Alex McKay
description:
Much-requested guest Alex McKay of the Marx Engels Lenin Institute (@MarxEngelsLnin) joins to talk about the many pitfalls of the western Left and how we can recover from decades of sabotage.
Marx Engels Lenin Institute Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@Marxengelsleninstalinmao
X @MarxEngelsLnin, 
Telegram: https://t.me/armc1870
editor@marxengelsinstitute.org
Identity Politics or Class Politics CPGB-(ML): https://thecommunists.org/2024/03/20/news/theory/book-identity-politics-class-joti-brar/
Identity Politics and the Transgender Trend CPGB-(ML): https://thecommunists.org/2019/12/05/news/book-identity-politics-transgender-trend-book/
